import React from 'react' const Detailusermodal = ({showModal, handleClose, selectDetailUser}) => { return (
Detail User : {selectDetailUser.Username}

UserID : {selectDetailUser.UserID}

Username : {selectDetailUser.Username}

Firstname : {selectDetailUser.Firstname}

Lastname : {selectDetailUser.Firstname}

Email : {selectDetailUser.Email}

User Role : {user.UserRoleId}

); }; export default Detailusermodal
